testcase.name: To verify the appearence of validation message after not passing the Edition from sign up screen1.
testcase.system-out: Given user is already on Sign Up Screen.....................................skipped And user enters "Megha","Jain","megha@yopmail.com","megha@yopmail.com","Megha_1132","Chetu@123" and "Chetu@123" into mandatory fields except Edition.skipped When user tries to sign up..................................................skipped Then appropriate message in a pop up related to please select the Edition should get displayed.skipped And sign up user should stay in sign up screen 1 only.......................skipped
